meanings.definition: The activities or events related to the production and performance of opera.
meanings.sent1: Attending operagoings is a delightful experience for music lovers.
meanings.sent2: The operagoings at the theater last night were truly spectacular.
meanings.sent3: The operagoings backstage were chaotic as the performers prepared for the show.
meanings.sent4: The operagoings in the opera house were like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The operagoings of the orchestra added a magical touch to the performance.

meanings.definition: The goings-on or happenings within the world of opera.
meanings.sent1: The operagoings of famous singers often make headlines.
meanings.sent2: I love reading about the latest operagoings in the opera world.
meanings.sent3: The operagoings of the diva were always full of drama and excitement.
meanings.sent4: The operagoings behind the scenes revealed the true dedication of the artists.
meanings.sent5: The operagoings of the opera company were a fascinating glimpse into their world.
